application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: 29 Rose Square, Fulham Road, LONDON, SW3 6RS
description: Details required by condition nos. 3a, c and d (submission of details - (a) Elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new doors and architraves with details of mouldings in section (1:1) and a plan showing locations of retained / historic doors and new doors. New doors shall be made of solid timber and hand painted; (c) Elevation, plan (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of new staircase balusters and handrail; and, (d) Internal elevation drawings of proposed new joinery in kitchen and linen store showing relationship between joinery and windows.) of listed building consent LB/23/06571 (Replacement of existing joinery, kitchen, bathrooms, services and staircase.)
